example.name: someday I'll do this
example.text: -- Of all scenes that evoke rural England, this is one of theloveliest: An ancient stone church stands amid the fields, the soundof bells cascading from its tower, calling the faithful to evensong.
The waterfall's cascading down into the canyon was beautiful.
